title: Steps to Knowledge: Continuation Training
content:
The Steps Continuation Training continues the life-changing journey begun in Steps to Knowledge. Containing 84 Steps, or practices, The Continuation Training takes you further toward the realization of your purpose and destiny in life.

If you have completed the journey in Steps to Knowledge twice and have followed the instructions without altering the curriculum, then you are ready to begin this more advanced study.

The Steps Continuation Training is available to students of the New Message at the New Knowledge Library store.

The Steps Continuation Training is the second book of Volume 3 of the New Message.
